import React from "react"; import Rating from "./Rating"; const DetailsItem = ({item}) => { return ( <>
{/*Image of the book is placed on the left*/}
{/*Details of the book is placed on the right*/}
{item.volumeInfo.title}
{Object.values(item.volumeInfo.authors).join(', ')}
{item.volumeInfo.saleInfo.country}
{/*Description/details are placed below*/}
Description
lorem ipsum
Details
ISBN: isbn
Publisher: publisher
Publication Date: pDate
Pages: pages
Product Dimension: dim
) } export default DetailsItem;
